onestream-custom-dev-mvp-to-millions.title: OneStream Custom Dev: From MVP to Millions
onestream-custom-dev-mvp-to-millions.author: IRON FORGE

content.text: In the world of enterprise finance, OneStream has quickly become the go-to platform for managing planning, reporting, and consolidation. But what truly unlocks OneStream's full potential isn't just using its out-of-the-box features ‚Äî it's building on top of it. That's where custom development comes in.

At IRON FORGE, we specialize in helping companies go from a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) ‚Äî a small proof-of-concept custom app inside OneStream ‚Äî to a fully scaled solution that drives efficiency, insight, and in some cases, millions in business value.
One of our recent clients ‚Äî a global logistics company ‚Äî approached us with a basic need:
Can you help us create a simple dashboard to track regional spending in real-time?

They were tired of waiting for end-of-month reports and manually combining Excel sheets. We built them an MVP inside OneStream ‚Äî a lightweight dashboard that pulled data directly from their source systems and visualized regional expenses with basic filtering.
The MVP went live in just three weeks. It wasn't fancy, but it worked. And that was the beginning.
After using the MVP for two months, the client came back with bigger ideas:

items: Could we add budget vs. actual comparisons?
What about drill-down views for each cost center?
Could it connect to their SAP system to pull HR data too?

content.text: That's where IRON FORGE's OneStream custom dev expertise kicked in. We architected a modular, scalable extension to their existing solution:

items: Designed a custom calculation engine for variance tracking
Built a workflow for monthly budget submissions by regional teams
Integrated with SAP for real-time headcount tracking

content.text: Over six months, what started as a dashboard MVP turned into a comprehensive financial cockpit, saving the company hundreds of analyst hours each month and improving their forecasting accuracy by over 30%.

OneStream is powerful, but every company is unique. Standard features only go so far. Our team at IRON FORGE dives deep into the OneStream extensibility framework ‚Äî using Business Rules, Extensible Documents, and the XF Marketplace ‚Äî to create custom solutions that match your exact needs.

Whether it's building a tax provisioning app, automating financial workflows, or integrating third-party systems, we build with a long-term view: scalable, maintainable, and fully aligned with OneStream best practices.
Whether you're starting with a single dashboard or dreaming of a full finance transformation, custom development in OneStream is the way forward.
Start small. Learn fast. Scale confidently. That's how IRON FORGE takes you from MVP‚Ä¶ to millions.
Reach out to our team today to see how we can help.

accelerating-financial-close.title: Accelerating Financial Close: 5 Key Strategies for OneStream Implementation
accelerating-financial-close.author: IRON FORGE

content.text: This is a placeholder for the Accelerating Financial Close article. The content would be structured similarly to the OneStream Custom Dev article above.

Data integration is the backbone of any successful OneStream implementation. Learn how to seamlessly integrate data from multiple sources into your OneStream environment with these proven strategies and techniques.
Before diving into integration strategies, it's crucial to understand the various data sources that typically feed into OneStream environments.
Follow these proven practices to ensure smooth and reliable data integration.

items: Implement data validation and cleansing procedures
Use staging tables for data transformation
Set up automated error handling and notifications
Regular testing and validation of integration processes

content.text: Explore advanced reporting capabilities and learn how to create dynamic, interactive financial reports that drive business insights and support strategic decision-making.
OneStream's advanced reporting features enable you to create sophisticated financial reports that adapt to your business needs.
Comprehensive guide to implementing robust security frameworks and access controls in your OneStream deployment to protect sensitive financial data and ensure compliance.
A well-designed security framework is essential for protecting sensitive financial information and maintaining regulatory compliance.

items: Data encryption and secure transmission protocols
